survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hybrid vehicle owners regarding their maintenance experiences, satisfaction with service providers, and overall ownership costs.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall maintenance experience of your hybrid vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for ease of selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall maintenance experience of your hybrid vehicle?

questions.question_text: Which of the following maintenance services have you utilized for your hybrid vehicle in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with an 'Other' option for additional inputs. Ensure responsive design for touch devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following maintenance services have you utilized for your hybrid vehicle in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for choosing your current hybrid vehicle maintenance provider?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses. Randomize answer order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for choosing your current hybrid vehicle maintenance provider?

questions.question_text: How does the maintenance cost of your hybrid vehicle compare to your expectations when purchasing the vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point scale. Ensure clear differentiation between scale points.

script.question_text: How does the maintenance cost of your hybrid vehicle compare to your expectations when purchasing the vehicle?

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you've faced with maintaining your hybrid vehicle:
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text (OPEN_TEXT) with character limit.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you've faced with maintaining your hybrid vehicle:
